value.name: The Latest: Family says Dallas court shooter wanted to die
value.description: Brian Isaack Clyde's father and stepmother told The Dallas Morning News that they hadn't seen any warning signs but think he went to the Earle Cabell Federal Building so security would kill him.

value.name: Masked gunman killed in shootout at Dallas courthouse
value.description: The FBI says Brian Isaack Clyde, 22, was killed after a gunfight with federal officials outside the building.
